'''Old Stone Slates''' are Quest Items that are part of the [[The Farmer's Treasure]] [[World Quest]]. Rescue [[Saimon Jirou]] from [[Jinren Island]], and he will ask you to collect the slates. There are a total of four stone slates that can be picked from around [[Narukami Island]].
